website_summaries.verdict: You might like them if you don't like strong compression; otherwise consider the others on our shortlist.
pros: Can prevent odor buildup with its unique breathable material
cons: These sleeves run large and don't offer a lot of compression

customer_reviews.title: Size chart not accurate if you're looking for true compression
customer_reviews.text: I am an athletic female and my bicep measures just at 12" when relaxed. This is right between M and L, so I opted for the M. It provides no compression. I will return and try the S. If you want true compression, consider take 1" off your measurement and going with the smaller of the two sizes if you're at the cut off.
customer_reviews.author: T. Putnam

customer_reviews.title: INCORRECT SIZING!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how these compression sleeves are measured in relation to size. It said it would fit a bicep that was 15” to 17”. This is NOT correct. I am much smaller than that and it was much too small!! The sleeves I ordered came from two different vendors. Ordered within 10 minutes of each other. Identical except for color. One I was able to return and the other I was told that I could not return. Buyer beware! Very surprised that one could be returned and the other I am stuck with!
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: you can use for lymphedema
customer_reviews.text: works well. i'm using it for lymphedema in my left arm. the sleeve has helped keep the swelling down. if you're using it for this reason, measure the arm that isn't swollen for proper sizing. this product is much less expensive than standard lymphedema sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Brown Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not compression sleeves!
customer_reviews.text: Compression? No. I order small to make sure I would get some compression from the product and there is absolutely none at all. They are basically arm sleeves. If that's what you're looking for the get these. But if you're looking for actual compression sleeves, get something else and save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy C

customer_reviews.title: Small is large...Return policy misleading
customer_reviews.text: I am a small women. These compression sleeves are advertised for both men and women, and specifically state there is a 30 return window. Very misleading. The "SMALL" sleeves are NOT. They might fit a medium boned man, not a small women. I could fit my leg in one with minimum compresssion. It was a loose sleevesaround my arm. When I initiated a return online, I received a response that this is a NON-RETURNABLE ITEM. I called AMAZON and there info says it is non-returnable. When I pointed out the guarantee /return promise on the item's page, the representative issued a credit. BUYER BEWARE. Amazon came through, though!
customer_reviews.author: Begee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sleeves after a shoulder cuff injury practicing handstand push ups at home. (Don't be alerted. I saw the Orthopedic Surgeon.) I'm an avid CrossFit athlete so I do various movements with my shoulders and arms. These sleeves, I bought two, help to support my arms and reduce the pain down my arm that I would otherwise experience without them. And another fun part of these sleeves, is they come in pretty colors which other companies may offer, but they don't have the same compression capability. I don't workout without them. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Ebonediva

customer_reviews.title: Usually Great but Lately Not So Much
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a couple different pairs of of these and I've always really enjoyed them. I've ordered medium and large but i find the mediums work the best for my workouts. That being said I tried ordering some new mediums. I recieved one medium and One extra large. I tried to have the mix up figured out but they never emailed me back after I sent them a picture of the package they came in. Unfortunate but I'll be switching products to a different seller. The new ones are shorter and feel like less compression as well when I did try the medium on.
customer_reviews.author: Drake

customer_reviews.title: I like the compression I get with these sleeves based upon the chart size recommendation.
customer_reviews.text: I got the medium for 11.5 inch measurement and it works just fine. I can feel the compression and got this for my left upper arm that was what I felt was strained from over usage. I put it on and could tell by the end of the day, it felt much less sore and tender than the times I never used a compression sleeve. There is some give with the sleeve but I found that it has the right amount of compression when pulling it up onto the upper arm. Looking to get another set soon too.
customer_reviews.author: Reversemidasman

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this item for others dealing with arthritis
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product, hoping to reduce the muscle ache from loading trailers at work. While wearing these compression sleeves, I am able to work full shift without the ache. I recommend this item for others dealing with arthritis, (which I have in elbows).
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Maybe if I had bigger biceps?
customer_reviews.text: Too long and loose despite buying appropriate size according to the size chart. Have yet to find a company that makes arm compression sleeves for petite women. No problem with the calf sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: EnJay

customer_reviews.title: ZERO compression
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves seem well made, the silicone at the top band is useful for keeping in place, however, they provide zero compression. I have tried Large (way to big) and Medium. The medium fits well at the top of my arm but the rest of the sleeve is loose. I simply do not fit into the small measurements so no reason to think those would fit any better. I do not have an issue with the quality, just that they truly do not provide actual compression. Was hoping to find an affordable way to manage my lymphedema. This is not it!
customer_reviews.author: KerrieC

customer_reviews.title: Compression Z sleeves work
customer_reviews.text: What I liked the most about the compression Z sleeves is the cooling effect it has when the wind blows. It not only blocks the uv rays it keeps you from getting sunburn. Less sunscreen you have to use and the compression it gives your arms is amazing. I used it while volunteering at the recently played women’s golf tournament in Hawaii (Lotte golf tournament). I was a standard bearer ( name and score sign carrier) for the players and as I stated, the sleeves gave me a nice cool and sun-blocking comfort. The compression effect it had on my arms felt great, no sore arms after a four day tourney walking 18 holes daily. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Just right for the weight and the compression.
customer_reviews.text: I use this compression sleeve for one arm that had surgery and must have pressure most of the time. I like this weight sleeve as it is more comfortable and it is easier to put on. I like the black color, for no particular reason. However, to get the comfort and the size in diameter that I like, I have to get one that is fairly large, and consequently it is too long for my arm. As far as the sun protection, with me it is great. I would recommend this sleeve for someone who likes the compression but does not want something thick and very tight. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: TeTi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: When I received the sleeves, I was somewhat surprised by the nylon spandex quality of the fabric, and wasn't sure the sleeves would work with my severe lymphedema in my arm. I put them on, and within a few hours, my arms were back to normal! I am thrilled with the sleeves, and will recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tight a band, too loose a sleeve
customer_reviews.text: These Medium sleeves remind me of stockings since there is a tight band to hold it up and the rest is loose like a sock. I suppose that my measurements are not ideal, 13.5" bicep and a little more closer to the place where I tried to put the band. I was using it both for some pain I am having (possible rotator cuff issue) and to prevent lymphedema. Since the band was very tight, I decided to remove it. Can't risk wearing something constricting that could actually bring on lymphedema. Like compression socks, I'm wondering if I'll need to go the custom route. It's getting returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mostlee

customer_reviews.title: Helps my pain
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery on both of my shoulders and afterwards my upper arm muscles have felt weak & sore, also pain in my forearms usually from other stuff, so I got these. I have only used them a few times so far but they did just what I I thought they would, made the pain way less & my muscles felt support. My tender underarm skin didn't like the silicone so I just fold it over & all works fine, I can also fold up the bottom once to keep it out of water. Some more surgery has interrupted my use but I look forward to them again. They weren't as hot as I feared.
customer_reviews.author: Atieno

customer_reviews.title: One of the better sets of sleeves.
customer_reviews.text: After some serious research, I decided to go with these Compression Z sleeves. They seem to be constructed well. They're light but kind of thick compared to others (in a good way). I am an active crossfitter and also spend some time doing some traditional type weightlifting. These sleeves keep my muscles warm, while keeping the arms cool when theres a slight breeze or I'm moving, a perfect balance. They have also helped with some of the pain I experience while working out (forearms, biceps, golf/tennis elbow). I'm definitely going to pick up a few more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynBounce

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly suprised
customer_reviews.text: For first time used sleeves today. Good evap cooling. Fit ok. I was looking for improving hand and forearm venous blood return flow. My aged fingers still have issues, say 50% improvement, but there may be a better solution. I went through issues with socks awhile back and now have a few good options. So overall, I liked the product, but I need to learn more and if improving blood flow is your issue this product will offer some relief. Amazon can require vendors to provide more information in this area which should improve products, outcome and sales.
customer_reviews.author: Rs

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable compression sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Although many sports were listed in the description for the Compression2 arm sleeves, curling was not one of them. I am a curler and was happy to see that the CompressionZ Arm Sleeves come in pairs, as I not only throw the stones, I do a lot of sweeping too. I wear the sleeves during the entire game. I'm definitely looking forward to using the sleeves while rowing. Arms can get fatigued, and I'm confident that the sleeves will be very helpful. The sleeves are very comfortable and give me aid in the relief of muscle soreness. An added bonus, the sleeves keep my arms warm which helps prevent muscle tightness.
customer_reviews.author: Rower

customer_reviews.title: I use these for lymphedema due to breast surgery!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and helpful for lymphedema without the lymphedema sleeve prices. I love them. And, they are sporty, too!! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Greater Customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I`ve only had the arm sleeves a few days, but already my lymphedema seems better. They`re comfortable & lightweight. I was concerned they`d be hot as I live in Florida & it`s HOT here in the summer, but so far so good. One thing that REALLY impressed me is the customer service. I received an email from the company BEFORE I received the arm sleeves thanking me for my business & assuring me they back their product 100%, if I had any problems. Then I received one after the package arrived with basically the same information. It`s very RARE you see that kind of dedication in a company nowadays. I recommend them highly!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My arm (bicep/tricep) measures as 21inch (fat). The sleeve fit well. It's fairly snug(as it should be) so i had to tug a bit to get it close up to my shoulder, but once it is on i feels great. I purchased it to help with blood circulation to reduce the sagging of the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Mostly Well
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like the fit and feel of this product. That's why I gave it 5 stars. I wanted to give it 4 stars, but the issue I ran into wasn't the fault of the sleeves at all. It's the shape of my arm. They didn't fit as tightly as I wanted, since the upper band that goes around my arm would dig in too much if I went a size smaller. I got a Medium pair. I believe a small would have been too tight. Nonetheless, there is enough compression, however slight, to give me some of the support I need.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: The arm burrito wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I have a love-hate relationship with these things. I love the extra thick;; and true to hold material, but they tend to curl down my arm after a few hours having me to readjust.. I use this in addition to a base layer compression underlayment. And in as much as I do that I can be outside without a coat on in much colder weather than I imagined. I do recommend them, but don't buy too large, buy as you are sized in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Handy Dandy.

customer_reviews.title: So nice, we bought two!
customer_reviews.text: Hello. I bought the compression sleeves for my Mom, who has had a lumpectomy. The reviews said many are using them for this purpose instead of the costly medical sleeves. Unfortunately we bought a size too big. Because this is exactly the right product in the wrong size, my Mom passed the larger one along to her friend and I ordered her a smaller size for herself. Your product is helping more people with a medical need. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee R. Cuti

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for petite people - great quality and materials though!
customer_reviews.text: The material is really comfortable and I can tell that it would be really effective if it was just a little smaller to provide the compression that I need. I ordered an xs size thinking it would be small enough but it is still a little loose for me, even when I pull it up further (I’m 118 lbs). When I layer both on top the same arm it’s perfect though, just a little too hot then. Would love to try it if it came an additional size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated my Pain
customer_reviews.text: I have some compressed nerves, and a slight compressed spinal cord which causes some pretty bad pain down one of my arms. I haven't been able to find anything to help, and surgery isn't an option at this time. So I thought I would try a compression sleeve to see if it might help and I couldn't believe how it took away the pain. It gets rid of about 80% of the pain I've been having for the last year. And yes, people will ask me why I'm wearing it, but that's no big deal, it gets rid of the pain and that is a big deal. It's lightweight, washes easily and is easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Tackett

customer_reviews.title: Nice sleeves
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice sleeves. I only wish that they had a better size chart. I ordered a medium because my bicep is 12” and it could be a little tighter. I bought them because I just tore my bicep tendon. And I need to hold it together until surgery. I don’t know if they are not tight because my bicep moved down my arm. Maybe it will fit better after surgery. I will continue to wear them after surgery for support. They are very comfortable. The forearm fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Dean C.

customer_reviews.title: XL way too tight upper arm
customer_reviews.text: I had surgery for a distal bicep tendon rupture. I was out in a bionic type cast. I needed compression sleeves to wear under the cast. I know this isn’t the main purpose of this product but for my specific purposes it wasn’t a good fit. The material is slippery and the cast had a hard time staying put. My main complaint was the size. I bought large, and XL. The extra large were way too tight where they hold in place above your bicep.
customer_reviews.author: TEA_BAG_MASTER

customer_reviews.title: Breathable and Cool
customer_reviews.text: I have used the pair of sleeves on 5/15/19 Wednesday and 5/16/19 Thursday on both warm and sunny days inTexas. I ordered the small and it was slightly long, but managed to work around that with no problems, and fits my arms perfectly. My arms were protected from the suns rays and the sweat has quickly dried off and surprisingly has kept my arms cool. I wash the sleeves in cold water and hang to dry (IMO hanging to dry preserves the fabrics longevity). Thank you CompressionZ for a well made product. I will recommend this product to my family and friends and my athletic and outdoor friends.
customer_reviews.author: OutDoorGuy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I have lymphedema in one arm. A good support sleeve will prevent swelling, but to reduce swelling a medical compression sleeve is needed. I do like how easy and smooth it is to put on, but not sure that it does much for lymphedema. Often a support sleeve is much heavier material and more snug. That type becomes too hot in the summer and will end up walking without. So, Im going to try this one and hope it helps. I can wear it 24 hrs a day. It's so comfortable, I forget Im wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Luciearl

customer_reviews.title: Need
customer_reviews.text: I have tendinitis in my left elbow. I often walk of hike 8 to 13 miles in a day. My elbow and lower arm would swell, always accompanied by pain. Wore these the first time today. Just completed a 10 mile walk, no pain or swelling. Very happy with these. Also a warm day and my left arm was as cool as my right arm. Plus the sweat was wick evaporating rather than running down my arm. I will be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I've had chronic swelling of my left arm from an old surgery. I haven't tried too many other compression sleeve brands but when I tried the CompressionZ arm sleeve I noted two things right away: 1) The sleeve did not curl up on my upper arm nor did it slip; 2) The amount of control of the edema in my arm was noticeable. The price for the product was excellent. Some reviewers recommended ordering the sleeve based on the diameter of your normal arm- obvious and worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Effective and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 items from Compression Z----plantars sleeves, calf sleeves and the arm sleeves. Very pleased with all three. The material is that almost shiny, slick feeling type and properly stretchy. And helpful. I also bought the same 3 body area items from another company. They are thicker and warmer than these. For me, each brand has uses. But these Compression Z items are thinner and somewhat cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Moccasin

customer_reviews.title: Great Compression Sleeves
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered quickly and on time, as expected with Amazon Prime. The retailer also sent a follow up email, thankful for the business, and offering support in case I had concerns. The product itself looks and feels like quality material, and it fit as expected. I typically play sports in the evening, while temps are still cool, and the arm sleeves gave me the fit and comfort I was looking for. Whether you are using these for support, or just to look cool, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean P

customer_reviews.title: My Recovering Broken Arm is Thankful!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had surgery to repair a compound fracture to my humerus. The recovery has been a pain and ace bandages and sleeves are also a pain. For me, this has been great! My OT said it might be helpful and it has been. It’s helped with swelling and pain, plus covers up a healing Frankenstein of a scar. It’s not too tight or too loose. I am glad I found.
customer_reviews.author: HillyBear

customer_reviews.title: ... in my left arm I needed to find a good compression sleeve to wear daily
customer_reviews.text: Having recently been diagnosed with lymphedema in my left arm I needed to find a good compression sleeve to wear daily. I purchased 3 or 4 different types until finding the compressionz sleeves. They are, by far, the most comfortable, most effective and better looking sleeves on the market. They are high quality material and do not tear like some of the cheaper sleeves I've tried. I highly recommend the compressionz sleeves for anyone with lymphedema.
customer_reviews.author: R. Olohan

customer_reviews.title: no compression
customer_reviews.text: The material was great that's the only good thing about these. I order a medium first ...too big. Then I ordered a small and they were actually a bit bigger than the medium. No compression waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Ishkotay

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, great compression, welcome relief!
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves provide great compression over the entire length of my arm providing relief from tendinitis pain caused by repetitive motions of computer work and lawn care tasks. They are lightweight and comfortable enough to wear all day. I found the fit to be spot-on as I bought the large size and my arm measurement is 14.5". I am really pleased and will be ordering another set.
customer_reviews.author: Jack DTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Saved us a fortune and seems to be a great product!
customer_reviews.text: My spouse has MS and also has cubita ltunnel syndrome, which is different from carpal tunnel syndrome and needs to sleep in these compression sleeves. We paid a fortune for a pair through the medical supply store and they smelled, because you couldn't wash them often. This seems to be doing the trick so far. He has to have litocaine patches on and they go right over them with no problem. Will be able to tell more as time goes on, but we are keeping our fingers crossed. They are definitely not too tight and have not lost their shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lee N. Rosenberg-Adams

customer_reviews.title: My feedback on compression sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I have lymphedema and needed a replacement compression sleeve. My sleeve arrived a day early. Not happy with driver noting he or she handed me my package. I was going thru my email and saw that my package was delivered. Anyway, I ordered a large and it was the perfect size except for a little tight on my upper arm. Hopefully it will loosen in time. The sleeve covers my entire arm. I think it will serve its purpose and I like that it comes in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Monique A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: It work great although I wish I had gotten a smaller size. I got a medium and it’s not enough compression to be greatly beneficial. I’m 5,6” and 150 lbs. my arms are average size for a woman. I usually wear a medium shirt. It keeps my arms warmer so it helps with aching arms by keeping them extra warm in these winter months. I’m planning on getting a size small hopefully soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tater

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Need
customer_reviews.text: Like the price; do not like the way the sleeve fits. If you want the sleeve to stay in place, order a smaller size. Do not like the fact that it is near impossible to get in touch with anyone at CompressionZ. When I was returning my first order, I tried to contact merchant to ask questions about the product. Cannot find any contact information.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Davey

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I am a truck driver and certain customers require I have long sleeves for safety reasons. On hot days I would have to put on a long sleeve over my short sleeve shirt. These are so much cooler! After wearing these for several hours I noticed my elbows did not hurt at the end of the day. I didn’t originally buy these for the compression but now I wear them even when I’m not required to. Even on hot days my arms stay cool and at the end of the day one less aching joint is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Cappy

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they have made such an amazing improvement in my life, my pain is almost gone and I can function much better, they are so lightweight you barely notice your wearing them, I didn’t rate sun protection because we haven’t had any sun, but if your in pain from arthritis, etc. these are definetly for you, they also came sooner than expected, I always appreciate that. Price was also amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: A great first compression sleeve experience.
customer_reviews.text: Lately I’ve been experiencing a painful aching in both forearms. This is the first pair of compression sleeves I’ve ever had. I expected them to be tight all over, like compression socks, but they were a bit loose around the wrist and elbows. The loose parts made movement easier. Where the material was tighter, I definitely felt pain relief. They were easy to put on and off, even though I have severe arthritis in my hands. The nude color is discreet. They are super soft. I’m very pleased with my first purchase of Compressionz.
customer_reviews.author: Angie D

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you have small arms
customer_reviews.text: These may be okay if you have normal size arms, but my arms are small and this isn’t that supportive. I was looking for a less expensive option to use while I work out for lymphedema after breast cancer, but this isn’t quite right for me. Also, I have washed these at least a dozen times and they still bleed every time which is a little concerning too.
customer_reviews.author: Kapaxmom

customer_reviews.title: Can't return! Too big
customer_reviews.text: Way too big. The small is more like a medium and the measurements are only length, not circumference. You can't return them, either, even though the card in the package says you can. Buy from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: shay

customer_reviews.title: Compression is very good
customer_reviews.text: Due to work from home, I’ve had some forearm pain that has been on and off again. I got the compression sleeve to see if it would help and it does. I have a 13” bicep and purchased a medium and it fits well. I was considering to get a small for even more forearm compression, but I have a hard enough time getting my hand through the medium as is since its snug enough.
customer_reviews.author: R. Leung

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but more important it actually works. My forearms get pumped from climbing and I need them to heal quickly so it doesn't interfer with my work, these help tremendously with that. Customer service is great too, ordered the wrong size on accident and they allowed me to send them back with no complainants. Which in turn allowed me to order the correct size and leave this review, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I would like unfortunately..the material is nice.. doesn’t give me the compression I would like.. as far as sun protection? I do not know.. UPDATE to my review: I did not have the correct size..so did not hv the compression that I wanted...so I emailed the company and my issue was resolved speedily! I give Customer service a high standard rating! The material is very comfortable and cool to touch.
customer_reviews.author: Diana A. White

customer_reviews.title: very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I am glad that there is a tan color now - I have been using these for my left arm that has a broken humerus and an issue with non-union. My arm is much more comfortable and functional with these sleeves. I wear them in all weather and they are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: H.T.O.

customer_reviews.title: Great price Point !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, if you not sure about the size just go with your shirt size. I use large so I order large and it work wonderful. Will definitely buy more sets. Material is high quality. Great price point.
customer_reviews.author: lester alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had a brachioplasty and used these for recovery. They feel really good compared to a more expensive brand that is $50 and too tight.. They are better for compression than cheaper versions. The only draw back is that even though I ordered a small, they were way too long. I am 5 feet tall. A friend hemmed them and now they are perfect. The bands are very comfortable on you upper arm.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke G.

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: After trying 2 other sleeves, with dis satisfactory results, this sleeve works wonderfully for my disabled mother who has lost mobility in her right arm due to shoulder deterioration, she used to be in constant pain and this sleeve helps relieve that pain and allows for some use of the arm again, thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: mystified8892

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, shortly after my original review  both stretched out and I'm unable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: * Updated Review* I have neuropathy and had surgery 11 months ago. Recently the pain returned with a vengeance, so I purchased this as a bandaid of sorts until I can get in to see my specialist. As skeptical as I was about it's claims I can say within one day of wearing this my arm and hands felt so much better and my mobility has increased. Unfortunately, shortly after this review both stretched out and I'm unable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: I love these sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I love these sleeves! The fabric really nice and not itchy. I wore them to work, it feels nice on the skin. Just the right amount of compression. And the color, I ordered small red, so nice and luxurious. Tips : please read the instruction how to care for these products and follow it. I hand-washed them in the sink before first used. The water turned a bit red, but not anymore on second wash. The seller also very attentive to their customers. It showed they take pride of their products. I definitely will buy more from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Hong

customer_reviews.title: VERY light compression, very comfortable, but fell apart within 30 days.
customer_reviews.text: I recently injured my biceps & tendons . I had golfers and tennis elbow , and bicep tendinitis. Pros : very comfortable, lightweight, not overly hot. Very light compression. Cons: not for rehabbing an injury, very little compression, the stitching on one sleeve started falling apart within a week of ordering. These were the highest rated sleeves on amazon which is why I ordered them. Great for VERY minor injuries, or for covering. I found that they work great if you apply another compression sleeve on top of them, but I just can’t recommend them, due to the fact that they started to fall apart within 30 days. Maybe mine were defective, but I sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the compressionx sleeve for my husband when we couldn't find anything locally. It helped immediately for swelling and inflammation issues he was having after a terrible triad elbow injury and surgery. Physical Therapist was impressed with quality of sleeve and amount of compression and how much it helped after only using for one day. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Monica G Loupe

customer_reviews.title: Price point.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and very smooth fabric. At a very reasonable price these compression sleeves are awesome. I wear them when i road bike, when i drive for UV protection and i wear them working out.💪💪💪👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: Soothing To Sore Arms
customer_reviews.text: These are very soothing for arm pain, especially if you over use your arms at work like I do. I over extend my arms sometimes by lifting heavy items at work. When I get home my arms are sometimes so painful I can't sleep. These are awesome for the pain ! They fit very well and are a well made product, being soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, stays in place, no roll
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product in Hope's to minimize the pain incurred after bi-cep and rotor cuff surgery. It does add relief in small increments. I can not wear all day, nor do I think you should during the healing process, however. After physical therapy it did aid to reduce the pain. I am allergic to most pain medicines so this was a welcome relief
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortabl to wear all day
customer_reviews.text: Have had elbow surgery with a free flap taken from my thigh. Completly healed but not too pretty. CompressiomZ to the rescue. Needed a full length sleeve. Ordered a pair of CompressionZ large. Great fit. Compression, length and size is perfect. Ordered second set after I left one in a hotel. Easy to wash out. Quick to dry. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps Immensely!
customer_reviews.text: My right arm has been hurting for months, and I was advised to try a good compression arm sleeve. I just received it yesterday and it's already been a huge blessing. My arm is overused both on and off the job and this compression sleeve helps tremendously. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E Abbey fan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, breathable, and good fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Since buying them I have a also bought my husband some and we have implemented them as part of our uniform at my work. I ordered 12 pairs for them. I use them for tattoo cover and they fit well and are breathable. The length is perfect and I never have to pull them up throughout the day even when wearing them for 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Meghan Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I am quite pleased with the compression wraps for my arms. The size is excellent, the material is high quality, and it's doing a great job on the muscle aches in my lower shoulder biceps and lower muscles in my arms. I would strongly recommend the average man (5' 8 to 5' 10) buy the large for average musculature.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Performed excellently for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these sleeves to aid in recovery from mild rhabdomyolysis in the arms, which caused swelling and discomfort. The sleeves help with compression and expedited my recovery rate, and were very comfortable even with swollen arms. As an added bonus, they felt great to wear to the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Antipode51

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend. He works at Panda Express and often is cooking with large woks. He mentioned his arms were very sore multiple times after working shifts. These sleeves really help reduce the soreness and muscle fatigue from work. He wears them under a thin under amour shirt and stated they are comfortable still. I can’t comment on sun protection, since he has mostly wears them indoors. My only complaint is that they are very difficult to put on by yourself. They are tight so they will stay on. I help him put them on for work, so it’s not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Punnybunny

customer_reviews.title: Helps with horrible forearm pain
customer_reviews.text: My arm was in horrible pain for several months due to a work injury that turned into a form of tendinitis with a big muscle knot that left my arm essentially useless, tried athletic tape that only worked for maybe an hour, all sorts of balms and didn’t have any luck, then tried the sleeves with a recommendation from a friend. The band that goes around your upper arm can get a bit tight and uncomfortable at times but it saved my forearm, giving it a comfortable light support that seriously helped the healing process, very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: W.maddux

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I got this compression sleeve for my father who suffers from tendonitis but likes to build/work a lot on things around the house. He claims he put this compression sleeve on and it worked like a charm while he was working on a construction project - no pain or aches at all! It really does help with blood flow and circulation. The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is because my father says it could be a little bit tighter and after wearing it may start to feel a little loose... but that may just be a size issue on my part. Overall, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product helps my tricep tendon .
customer_reviews.text: great product .puts the right amount of pressure on my arm but not too much . I have a pulled tendon and have to work with the arm every day with this and I also use an elbow sleave with it I have much less stress on the tricep tendon so the pain is not only less but also I wear it all day it it is healing up too.
customer_reviews.author: Fishin  magician

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE my compression arm sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Compression Arm Sleeves!!! I have Lymphadema in my left arm and my VERY expensive, prescription compression sleeve that I have worn for years was basically worn out. I order 'everything' from Amazon and decided to look for a compression sleeve there and found yours and thought I would give them a try. LOVE THEM - only thing, I don't see any instructions on how to care for them. Other than that, I'm one happy lady and probably gonna order more so I can have one for every day of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy D Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing products!
customer_reviews.text: These have been life savers for my husband. He has carpal tunnel and arthritis in both hands/arms and these he’s able to use on a daily basis at his work (tow operator) and loves how his arms feel.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I am a runner and needed a bit of help getting back to my old endurance after a short break. On my first run while wearing these sleeves I felt myself running just a little bit farther than I had without them. The material is really durable and has a nice "rubber-lined" edges so that the sleeve doesn't slip during your workout. Definitely a nice product to have in your gym bag!
customer_reviews.author: Julian Solis

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! My stepfather had a stroke some years ago and has been bed ridden ever since. He started to have swelling in his arms due to lack of movement according to the doctor who recommended a product like this. We tried it and it worked beautifully. I was worried that it might fit to tight bit it was perfect. Swelling is now under control. I might get a couple for myself. Everything was shipped and packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: DeltaC

customer_reviews.title: Fit over a short period of time
customer_reviews.text: Sleeve fits tight for only a about 6-weeks of regular wear and tare. If you pull the sleeve t the shoulder it stretches out and no longer fits. I have purchased two of these and with the same issue. If used for sun protection only this item is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Capuano

customer_reviews.title: Care Instructions
customer_reviews.text: CompressionZ Arm Sleeves are perfect for me. They arrived promptly and I use them almost daily.Certainly helps alleviate my elbow pain from tendonitis. Vendor should include laundry/care instructions as none were included. My routine is to hand wash them daily in a mild detergent in cold or lukewarm water and let air dry. Washing after use should be recommended especially after vigorous exercise.
customer_reviews.author: LMScib

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, durability, and value.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have thoroughly enjoyed these. I primarily bought them for sun protection outside while wearing short sleeves, however I feel that the compression helps blood flow and keeping things in line. I look forward to trying them while bowling as well.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Will not say in place
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately they drift down my arm during the day and during any activity. I purchased another brand at the same time I bought these and the other brand stays in place all day long. Both are large sizes. I do like the material thickness of these but gets pretty annoying having to pull them up periodically.
customer_reviews.author: scaryd

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: First off I love the price for the pair and the quality is even better. I was worried that the fit might be off some but to my surprise they fit perfect. I highly recommend this product to anyone that will be in need of some compression sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: George E. Abraham

customer_reviews.title: These are NOT compression sleeves
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT compression sleeves. It's basically spandex and will not hold in the arm any more than those spandex pants hold in your thighs. It should not be marketed to help lynphedema or tendonitis. I wish I would have paid attention to the negative reviews. There is no point in paying for shipping in order to return.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for playing golf and they really help with minimizing the impact from hitting the golf ball to the ground. At the end of the day my arms feel great with zero pain at all. I plan on buying multiple sets of these, I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Good compression but bad stitching (updated)
customer_reviews.text: After one use the stitching started to come off. Very comfortable and good to use. Just sad that the stitching is already coming apart Update: they sent me a replacement for the stitching issues and I will let you know if the stitching holds up. 6/10/2020
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Towata

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’6 with skinny extra long arms. Bought the small, and they are....PERFECT! They really help when I’m working in the restaurant, keep my arms from bruises and cuts. The top silicon non - slip has held up nicely to laundry (I machine wash and air dry)
customer_reviews.author: happtradr

customer_reviews.title: These are like support hose for your arms
customer_reviews.text: I have tendon problems in my upper arm, and I tried using an ace bandage ... but this sleeve is so much better. It fits over my entire arm, and even when it's very hot outside, is extremely comfortable. They give enough support so that I can do gardening and lifting and other household chores without extreme pain. They are great!!
customer_reviews.author: edee

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the sleeves for my husband. He loves them. The material is very nice and I was impressed with their look. I wanted to order my grandson a black pair in large size, but you did not have a large size in black when I was ordering them. I selected another brand and have not seen them in person. I just hope they are as nice as the CompressionZ sleeves.
customer_reviews.author: C.R.

customer_reviews.title: Best sleeve yet!I
customer_reviews.text: I love this sleeve. It would be 5 stars except it is too loose at the wrist. I may downsize one and see if hat works better. It is great quality and it doesn't roll at the top like other more expensive ones. Great product and I will definitely be ordering other colors.
customer_reviews.author: jk17

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what is needed.
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what was needed. Had a painful bicep strain and this certainly eased the pain ina . day or so and also help with further activity. Goes down to the wrist and 2/3 the way up the bicep. And my arms are long. At 6ft 2, I was expecting this to come up short but it doesn't. Great price and great product
customer_reviews.author: John Holley

customer_reviews.title: This one worked
customer_reviews.text: I needed a compression sleeve for my arm, following surgery, for a flight. The first one ordered was too big, great customer service when it was returned, and ordered the small. It was a perfect fit and provided the needed compression.
customer_reviews.author: M. Doherty

customer_reviews.title: FEELS WONDERFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: Arm has been swollen for a couple weeks. Finally got my compression sleeve and wear it now EVERY day. Feels great and does the job it's supposed to do!!! Thanks so much for this great product. I did order 2 sets and am happy I did.
customer_reviews.author: E. Eckel

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these sleeves for compression of forearm veins. I ordered a small size, as I weigh 110 lbs. I would like them a bit snugger, but as I wear them, they may turn out to be perfect. Length is fine. They are sturdy but lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome compression sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Ok, these are really great. I hurt my arm and have been using these to aid recovery. They feel great and are really lightweight. They hold their form well and keep your muscles tight during activity. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: j.Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Must have, best quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these. After loosing 130lbs the sleeves make me feel like I'm normal and people can't see the loose skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: Two things wrong here. The main thing istheir sizing is way off and all I wanted to do was exchange it for a smaller size or return it. Apparently you can’t do that at all. A little thin for my liking but they would’ve worked out.now it won’t work it out at all and I’m stuck with something I can’t use. Don’t buy these.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Sleeve is comfortable and much cooler than some other sleeves I've purchased (a MUST in the summer heat). It has a mild-moderate compression which makes it good for sleeping. All in all a great sleeve for my purpose (arm lymphedema). If you have lymphedema of a more severe nature, a stronger compression may be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Effective for lymphedema too
customer_reviews.text: I use these sleeves for lymphedema. I love that the fabric is slick and I can slide my arm easily into long sleeve shirts, but they are not as effective as a heavier Juzo sleeve. I’ve found that I can wear these on days that I’m not putting stress on my arm with heavy arm activity or cardio. For me, these sleeves were the right diameter at the wrist and bicep. Other brands were too loose at the wrist making them ineffective for lymphedema support.
customer_reviews.author: Hard to impress

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable and does a good job on keeping the swelling ...
customer_reviews.text: I have lymphedema from breast cancer radiation therapy. My Juzo custom-made sleeve actually hurts if I wear it more than 30 minutes. I thought I'd give this a try. It's light, cannot say yet as to wicking but supposed to. It is comfortable and does a good job on keeping the swelling down. It is so comfortable that I wear it all day and have actually slept well while wearing it. The elastic band on top of the sleeve works well, too. This is a real boon for me! Rating 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: The upper band is a little too tight and started falling apart after a couple uses and they are too loose around the forearm. The sellers also seem untrustworthy. I think the only reason the sleeves have such a good rating is because the seller sends emails promising free items if you leave (or don't leave) a rating; you just have to reply to the email. I'm still waiting for the free item they promised but I will not lie to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: PAIN RELIEF
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THE COMPRESSION ARM SLEEVES IN HOPES THAT THEY WOULD HELP IN MY NERVE PAIN . I HAD NECK SURGERY AND THAT DIDN'T HELP . BUT FOR SOME REASON THE COMPRESSION ON MY ARMS TAKES MOST OF THE BURNING TINGLING PAIN AWAY. I RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT. I THINK IT WILL HELP OTHERS WHO ARE IN PAIN.
customer_reviews.author: luguna

customer_reviews.title: Good compression sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to, however mine roll a bit sometimes. That is honestly expected though for where it sits on the arm. I have lupus and needed some pressure relief for the pain in my arms and it does help.
customer_reviews.author: hillaryann03

product_meta.title: CompressionZ Compression Arm Sleeves for Men Women UV Protection Baseball Basketball Tennis Golf Elbow Sleeve Sports Arm Warmers Lymphedema
feature_bullets: PAIN RELIEF: Use as a lymphedema sleeve, tendonitis elbow brace, or other medical arm concerns. Reduce swelling and inflammation from sports including CrossFit, softball, football, or weightlifting.
ATHLETIC SPORT COMPRESSION: Sleeves act as arm warmers for running and cycling in cool weather. Ideal for wearing as a medical compression sleeve for muscle and joint support to reduce swelling.

QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST: Our protective elbow sleeve for women and men is comfortable & breathable. Each arm support sleeve is made from lightweight fabric that stays put, wicks perspiration, and offers UV protection.
DURABLE ARM COMPRESSION SLEEVE: Forearm and elbow sleeve supports muscles with added compression. Ideal for use as arm support for any activity. Purchase a size down for added compression.
TRUSTED QUALITY & SATISFACTION: We commit to sourcing only the highest premium quality fabric for our men and women arm sleeves. True compression muscle support. We're proud to be a US based company.
